author: Paul O'Flynn
title: Emissions fall, air quality up amid orders to stay home
description: Carbon dioxide emissions around the world could fall by the largest amount since World War II this year, scientists have said, as the coronavirus outbreak brings economies to a virtual standstill.
content:
Carbon dioxide emissions around the world could fall by the largest amount since World War II this year, scientists have said, as the coronavirus outbreak brings economies to a virtual standstill.
As commuters are urged to stay at home, air quality in cities… [+3098 chars]
